description.narrative: The purpose of this project is to support the Guatemalan public and private financial sector to facilitate access to credit and financial products for the forestry sector, promoting Competitive and Sustainable Landscapes. The Project shall create the basis for an efficient integration and synergistic access, from the land owners of woodlands and forests to the policy instruments and public financing (SIGAP, PINPEP, and PROBOSQUE), as well as private capital and financing for forestry and agroforestry management, increase in productivity, value added and access to higher value markets
